issue.title: [Python][Doc] pyarrow.set_io_thread_count is not documented
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14997](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14997). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It is referenced in the see also section of https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.set_cpu_count.html but the link is not working because there are no docs for the call.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14997?focusedCommentId=17498997) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12519
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12519>
